TiledArray::expressions::ScalMultEngine< Left, Right, Scalar, Result > Class Template Reference

Documentation

template<typename Left, typename Right, typename Scalar, typename Result>
class TiledArray::expressions::ScalMultEngine< Left, Right, Scalar, Result >

Scaled multiplication expression engine.

Similar to MultEngine but implements the result of MultEngine scaled by a constant.

Template Parameters
LeftThe left-hand engine type
RightThe Right-hand engine type
ScalarThe scaling factor type
ResultThe result tile type

Definition at line 44 of file mult_engine.h.

◆ perm_vars()

template<typename Left , typename Right , typename Scalar , typename Result >
void TiledArray::expressions::ScalMultEngine< Left, Right, Scalar, Result >::perm_vars ( const VariableList &  target_vars)
inline

Set the variable list for this expression.

This function will set the variable list for this expression and its children such that the number of permutations is minimized. The final variable list may not be set to target, which indicates that the result of this expression will be permuted to match target_vars.

Parameters
target_varsThe target variable list for this expression
